1.1: Efi Adam So Kosi Noa Mma SoAdam asefo yɛ Set, Enos,
1.4: Noa mma ne, Sem, Ham, ne Yafet.
1.5: Yafet AsefoNa Yafet asefo ne Gomer, Magog, Media, Yawan, Tubal, Mesek ne Tiras.
1.6: Na Gomer asefo ne Askenas, Rifat ne Togarma.
1.7: Na Yawan asefo ne Elisa, Tarsis, Kitim ne Rodanim.
1.8: Ham AsefoNa Ham asefo ne Kus, Misraim, Put ne Kanaan.
1.9: Na Kus asefo ne Seba, Hawila, Sabta, Raama ne Sabteka. Na Raama asefo yɛ Saba ne Dedan.
1.10: Kus woo Nimrod. Na Nimrod bɛyɛɛ ɔkofo kɛse wɔ asase so.
1.11: Na Misraim wooLudfo, Anamfo, Lehabfo, Naftuhfo,
1.12: Patrusfo, Kasluhfo ne Kaftorfo a wɔn ase na Filistifo fi.
1.13: Na Kanaan woo nʼabakanSidon ne Het,
1.16: Arwadfo, Semarifo ne Hamatifo tete agya.
1.17: Sem AsefoNa Sem asefo yɛ Elam, Asur, Arfaksad, Lud ne Aram.Aram asefo ne Us, Hul, Geter ne Mas.
1.18: Na Arfaksad woo Sela na Sela woo Eber.
1.19: Eber woo mmabarima baanu. Wɔtoo ɔbaako din Peleg a ase kyerɛ Nkyekyɛmu, efisɛ nʼawobere mu na kasa ahorow nti, nnipa a wɔwɔ asase so mu kyekyɛe ma wɔhwetee. Na wɔtoo ne nua a ɔka ne ho no din Yoktan.
1.20: Yoktan woo Almodada, Selef, Hasarmawet, Yera,
1.23: Ofir, Hawila ne Yobab. Eyinom nyinaa yɛ Yoktan asefo.
1.24: Ɛno nti, eyi ne anato a efi Sem: Arfaksad, Selah,
1.27: ne Abram a akyiri no, wɔfrɛɛ no Abraham no.
1.28: Abraham AsefoAbraham mmabarima yɛ Isak ne Ismael.
1.29: Na Ismael mmabarima nso neNebaiot a ɔyɛ nʼabakan, Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam,
1.31: Yetur, Nafis ne Kedema.Eyinom ne Ismael mmabarima.
1.32: Na Abraham mpena Ketura mmabarima ne Simran, Yoksan, Medan, Midian, Yisbak ne Sua.Na Yoksan asefo yɛ Seba ne Dedan.
1.33: Midian woo Efa, Efer, Henok, Abida ne Eldaa.Eyinom nyinaa yɛ Ketura asefo.
1.34: Isak AsefoAbraham woo Isak. Isak mmabarima yɛ Esau ne Israel.
1.35: Esau AsefoNa Esau mmabarima yɛ Elifas, Reuel, Yeus, Yalam ne Kora.
1.36: Na Elifas mmabarima yɛ Teman, Omar, Sefi, Gatam, Kenas, Timna ne Amalek.
1.37: Na Reuel mmabarima yɛ Nahat, Serah, Sama ne Misa.
1.38: Edomfo AbɔseNa Seir mmabarima yɛ Lotan, Sobal, Sibeon, Ana, Dison, Eser ne Disan.
1.39: Na Lotan mmabarima yɛ Hori ne Homam. Na Lotan nuabea din de Timna.
1.40: Na Sobal mmabarima yɛ Alian, Manahat, Ebal, Sefi ne Onam.Sibeon mmabarima yɛ Aya ne Ana.
1.41: Na Ana babarima yɛ Dison.Na Dison mma yɛ Hemdan, Esban, Yitran ne Keran.
1.42: Na Eser mmabarima yɛ Bilhan, Saawan ne Akan.Na Disan mmabarima yɛ Us ne Aran.
1.43: Edom SodifoEyinom ne ahemfo a wodii Edom so ansa na Israelfo renya ahemfo:Beor babarima Bela, a ɔtenaa kuropɔn Dinhaba so dii hene.
1.44: Na Bela wui no, Serah babarima Yobab a ofi Bosra bedii nʼade sɛ ɔhene.
1.45: Na Yobab wui no, Husam a ofi Teman asase so bedii nʼade sɛ ɔhene.
1.46: Husam wu akyi no, Hadad a ɔyɛ Bedad babarima a okodii Midian so nkonim wɔ Moab asase so no na odii nʼade sɛ ɔhempɔn. Wɔtoo nʼahenkurow no din Hawit.
1.47: Hadad wui no, Samla a ofi Masreka kuropɔn mu bɛyɛɛ ɔhene.
1.48: Samla wui no, Saulo a ofi Rehobot a ɛda asu Eufrate ho no bedii hene.
1.49: Na Saulo wui no, Akbor babarima Baal-Hanan bedii hene.
1.50: Baal-Hanan wui no, Hadad tenaa kuropɔn Pai mu dii hene. Na ne yere a wɔfrɛ no Mehetabel no yɛ Matred babea ne Me-Sahab nso nena.
1.51: Na Hadad nso wui.Na Edom mmusua no ntuanofo neTimna, Alia, Yetet,
1.54: Magdiel ne Iram.Eyinom na na wɔyɛ Edom mmusua ntuanofo.

2.1: Israel Awo NtoatoasoIsrael mmabarima yɛ Ruben, Simeon, Lewi, Yuda, Isakar, Sebulon,
2.2: Dan, Yosef, Benyamin, Naftali, Gad ne Aser.
2.3: Yuda AsefoYuda ne Kanaannibea Bat-Sua woo mmabarima baasa.Na wɔn din de Er, Onan ne Sela.Nanso na abakan Er no yɛ omumɔyɛfo nti, Awurade kum no.
2.4: Akyiri no, Yuda ne nʼase kunafo Tamar woo nta. Na wɔn din de Peres ne Serah.Enti Yuda woo mmabarima baanum.
2.5: Na Peres mmabarima din deHesron ne Hamul.
2.6: Serah mmabarima din deSimri, Etan, Heman, Kalkol ne Dara; wɔyɛ baanum.
2.7: Akar a ɔyɛ Karmi babarima ne Serah asefo no mu baako nam fa a ɔfaa asade a wogyaw maa Awurade no so, de amanehunu baa Israelfo so.
2.9: Efi Yuda Nana Barima Hesron So Kosi Dawid SoHesron mmabarima din de Yerahmeel, Ram ne Kaleb.
2.10: Ram yɛ Aminadab agya.Aminadab yɛ Nahson a na ɔyɛ Yuda ntuanoni no agya.
2.11: Nahson yɛ Salma agya.Na Salma nso yɛ Boas agya.
2.12: Boas yɛ Obed agya.Obed yɛ Yisai agya.
2.13: Yisai abakan yɛ Eliab nea ɔto so abien yɛ Abinadab na nea ɔto so abiɛsa yɛ Simea.
2.14: Na nea ɔto so anan yɛ Netanel na Radai to so anum.
2.15: Ne babarima a ɔto so asia no din de Osem na Dawid na na ɔto so ason.
2.16: Na wɔn nuabeanom din de Seruia ne Abigail.Na Seruia woo mmabarima baasa a wɔn din yɛ Abisai, Yoab ne Asahel.
2.17: Abigail waree ɔbarima bi a ne din de Yeter a ɔyɛ Ismaelni na wɔwoo ɔbabarima a wɔtoo no din Amasa.
2.18: Hesron Babarima Kaleb AsefoNa Hesron babarima Kaleb wɔ yerenom baanu a wɔne Asuba ne Yeriot. Na Asuba mmabarima din de Yeser, Sobab ne Ardon.
2.19: Asuba wu akyi no, Kaleb waree Efrata. Wɔwoo ɔbabarima too no din Hur.
2.20: Hur woo Uri. Uri nso woo Besaleel.
2.21: Bere a Hesron dii mfe aduosia no, ɔwaree Gilead nuabea a na ɔyɛ Makir babea. Wɔwoo ɔbabarima too no din Segub.
2.22: Segub woo Yair a odii nkurow aduonu abiɛsa so wɔ Gilead asase so no.
2.23: (Akyiri no, Gesur ne Aram gyee Yair nkurow, san gyee Kenat ne ne nkuraa aduosia a atwa ho ahyia no nyinaa.)Na eyinom nyinaa yɛ Makir a ɔyɛ Gilead agya no asefo.
2.24: Hesron wuu wɔ kurow Kaleb-Efrata mu akyi no, ne yere Abia woo ɔbabarima a wɔtoo no din Asur (Tekoa agya).
2.25: Hesron Ba Yerahmeel AsefoHesron abakan Yerahmeel mmabarima a ɔwoo wɔn no din yɛRam (abakan), Buna, Oren, Osem ne Ahiya.
2.26: Na Yerahmeel wɔ ɔyere a ɔto so abien a wɔfrɛ no Atara, na ɔno na ɔwoo Onam.
2.27: Ram a ɔyɛ Yerahmeel abakan no mmabarima yɛMaas, Yamin ne Eker.
2.28: Onam mmabarima yɛSamai ne Yada.Na Samai mmabarima yɛNadab ne Abisur.
2.29: Na Abisur ne ne yere Abihail mmabarima yɛ Ahban ne Molid.
2.30: Na Nadab mmabarima yɛSeled ne Apaim. Seled wui a wanwo mma;
2.31: na Apaim de, ɔwoo ɔbabarima a wɔfrɛ no Yisi.Na Yisi woo Sesan. Na Sesan nyaa nʼaseni bi a wɔfrɛ no Ahlai.
2.32: Na Samai nuabarima Yada wooYeter ne Yonatan. Na Yeter wui a wanwo ba biara,
2.33: nanso Yonatan woo mmabarima baanu a na wɔfrɛ wɔnPelet ne Sasa.Na eyinom nyinaa yɛ Yerahmeel asefo.
2.34: Na Sesan annya mmabarima, onyaa mmabea.Na ɔwɔ Misraimni somfo bi a ne din de Yarha.
2.35: Sesan de ne mmabea no mu baako maa Yarha aware na wɔwoo ɔbabarima too no din Atai.
2.36: Atai woo Natanna Natan woo Sabad.
2.38: Obed woo Yehuna Yehu woo Asaria.
2.40: Eleasa woo Sisemaina Sisemai woo Salum.
2.41: Salum woo Yekamia,na Yekamia woo Elisama.
2.42: Hesron Babarima Kaleb AsefoYerahmeel nua Kalebbabarima piesie ne Mesa a ɔyɛ Sif agya.Na Kaleb babarima a ɔto so abien din de Maresa a ɔyɛ Hebron agya.
2.43: Na Hebron mmabarima yɛKora, Tapua, Rekem ne Sema.
2.44: Na Sema woo Raham.Raham woo Yorkeam.Na Rekem woo Samai.
2.45: Na Samai woo Maon.Maon woo Bet-Sur.
2.46: Na Kaleb mpena Efa wooHaran, Mosa ne Gases.Na Haran woo Gases.
2.47: Na Yahdai mmabarima yɛRegem, Yotam, Gesan, Pelet, Efa ne Saaf.
2.48: Kaleb mpena foforo bi a wɔfrɛ no Maaka wooSeber ne Tirhana.
2.49: Ɔsan woo Saaf a na ɔyɛ Madmana agyane Sewa a na ɔyɛ Makbena ne Gibea agya.Na Kaleb woo ɔbabea a ne din de Aksa.
2.50: Eyinom nyinaa yɛ Kaleb asefo.Kaleb Babarima Hur AsefoKaleb yere Efrata abakan Hur mmabarima yɛSobal a ɔyɛ Kiriat-Yearim agya
2.51: Salma a ɔyɛ Betlehem agya ne Haref a ɔyɛ Bet-Gader agya.
2.52: Sobal a ɔyɛ Kiriat-Yearim agya no mmabarima yɛHaroe a ne fa yɛ Manahatini
2.53: na ne fa a aka no fi Kiriat-Yearim mmusua mu. Sobal asefo a wɔka ho ne Yitrifo, Putifo, Sumatifo ne Misraimfo, wɔn mu na Sorafo ne Estaolfo fi.
2.54: Salma asefo yɛBetlehem, Netofafo, Atrot-Bet-Yoabfo, Manahatafo fa bi, Sorifo,
2.55: ne akyerɛwfo mmusua a wɔte Yabes no, Tirafo, Simeafo ne Sukatfo. Eyinom nyinaa yɛ Kenifo, Hamat a ɔyɛ Rekab agya no asefo.

3.1: Dawid AsefoEyinom ne mmabarima a wɔwowoo wɔn maa Dawid wɔ Hebron.Na nʼabakan din de Amnon a ne na a na ofi Yesreel no din de Ahinoam.Ne ba a ɔto so abien no, na ne din de Daniel. Na ne na a ofi Karmel no din de Abigail.
3.2: Ne ba a ɔto so abiɛsa no, na wɔfrɛ no Absalom. Na ne na din de Maaka a na ɔyɛ Gesurhene Talmai babea.Ne ba a ɔto so anan din de Adoniya a ne na din de Hagit.
3.3: Ne ba a ɔto so anum no, na wɔfrɛ no Sefatia. Na wɔfrɛ ne na Abital.Ne ba a ɔto so asia no din de Yitream a na wɔfrɛ ne na Egla.
3.4: Wɔwowoo mmabarima baasia yi nyinaa maa Dawid wɔ Hebron. Odii ade wɔ hɔ mfirihyia ason ne fa.Dawid yii kuropɔn no kɔɔ Yerusalem, na odii ade mfirihyia aduasa abiɛsa wɔ hɔ.
3.5: Mmabarima a wɔwowoo wɔn maa Dawid wɔ Yerusalem no ne:Simea, Sobab, Natan ne Salomo. Amiel babea Batseba na ɔwoo saa mmarima yi.
3.6: Wɔsan wowoo mmabarima baakron bi maa Dawid. Wɔne Yibhar, Elisua, Elifelet,
3.9: Eyinom ne Dawid mmabarima a ne mpena mma nka ho. Na Dawid wɔ ɔbabea bi a wɔfrɛ no Tamar.
3.10: Salomo AsefoNa Salomo asefo yɛRehoboam, Abia, Asa, Yehosafat,
3.15: Na Yosia mmabarima neYohanan a ɔyɛ abakan,Yehoiakim to so abien,Sedekia to so abiɛsa,na Salum to so anan.
3.16: Yehoiakim babarima Yehoiakyin na odii nʼade,na ɔno nso ne wɔfa Sedekia bedii nʼade.
3.17: Yehoiakyin AsefoYehoiakyin a Babiloniafo kyeree no kɔtoo afiase nommabarima ne Sealtiel,
3.18: Malkiram, Pedaia, Senasar, Yekamia, Hosama ne Nedabia.
3.19: Na Pedaia mmabarima yɛSerubabel ne Simei.Na Serubabel mmabarima yɛMesulam ne Hanania. Na ɔwɔ ɔbabea nso a ne din de Selomit.
3.20: Na ne mmabarima baanum bi nso din ne Hasuba, Ohel, Berekia, Hasadia ne Yusab-Hesed.
3.21: Na Hanania mmabarima din dePelatia ne Yesaia. Na Yesaia babarima din de Refaia. Na Refaia babarima din de Arnan. Na Arnan babarima din de Obadia. Na Obadia babarima din de Sekania.
3.22: Na Sekania asefo yɛSemaia ne ne mmabarima Hatus, Igal, Baria, Nearia ne Safat. Na wɔn nyinaa yɛ baasia.
3.23: Na Nearia mmabarima din deElioenai, Hiskia ne Asrikam. Na wɔyɛ baasa.
3.24: Na Elioenai mmabarima din deHodawia, Eliasib, Pelaia, Akub, Yohanan, Delaia ne Anani. Na wɔyɛ baason.

4.1: Yuda Asefo NkaeYuda asefo no bi din dePeres, Hesron, Karmi, Hur ne Sobal.
4.2: Sobal babarima Reaia na ɔwoo Yahat. Yahat woo Ahumai ne Lahad. Eyinom na na wɔyɛ Sorafo mmusua.
4.3: Na Etam asefo no neYesreel, Yisma, Yidbas ne Haslelponi a na ɔyɛ ne babea,
4.4: Penuel a na ɔyɛ Gedor agya ne Eser a na ɔyɛ Husa agya. Eyinom na na wɔyɛ Hur a na ɔyɛ Efrata abakan ne Betlehem agya no asefo.
4.5: Na Tekoa agya a ne din de Ashur no wɔ yerenom baanu a wɔfrɛ wɔn Hela ne Naara.
4.6: Naara woo Ahusam, Hefer, Temeni ne Ahastari.
4.8: ne Kos a nʼasefo ne Anub, Hasobeba ne Harum babarima Aharhel, Harum ne ne mmusua nyinaa.
4.9: Na ɔbarima bi wɔ hɔ a wɔfrɛ no Yabes a ɔyɛɛ ɔkɛse sen ne nuabarimanom nyinaa. Ne na too no din Yabes, efisɛ onyaa ɔyaw wɔ nʼawo mu.
4.10: Yabes ne obi a ɔbɔɔ mpae kyerɛɛ Israel Nyankopɔn se, “Ao, hyira me na trɛw mʼahye mu. Mesrɛ wo, ka me ho wɔ nea mɛyɛ biara mu, na yi me fi ɔhaw ne ɔyaw nyinaa mu.” Na Onyankopɔn yɛɛ nʼabisade no maa no.
4.11: Suba nuabarima Kelub woo Mehir. Mehir woo Eston.
4.12: Eston woo Bet-Rafa, Paseah ne Tehina. Tehina woo Ir-Nahas. Eyinom ne Reka asefo.
4.13: Kenas mmabarima neOtniel ne Seraia.Otniel mmabarima neHatat ne Meonotai.
4.14: Meonotai woo Ofra.Na Seraia woo Yoaba ofii Adwumfo Bon ase, efisɛ na adwumfo pii tete hɔ.
4.15: Na Yefune babarima Kaleb mmabarima yɛIru, Ela ne Naam.Na Ela babarima yɛKenas.
4.16: Yehalelel mmabarima neSif ne Sifa, Tiria ne Asarel.
4.17: Ɛsra mmabarima yɛYeter, Mered, Efer ne Yalon.Mered waree Misraimnibea ma ɔwoo Miriam, Samai ne Yisba a ɔbɛyɛɛ Estemoa agya no.
4.18: Mered nso waree ɔbea a ofi Yuda.Ɔno nso woo Yered a ɔbɛyɛɛ Gedor agya, Heber a ɔyɛ Soko agya, ne Yekutiel a ɔyɛ Sanoa agya. Na wɔfrɛ Mered yere Misraimni no se Bitia a na ɔyɛ Misraimhene babea.
4.19: Na Hodia yere yɛ Naham nuabea.Ne mmabarima no mu baako na ɔwoo Keila a ɔyɛ Garmini na ɔbaako nso woo Estemoa a ɔyɛ Maakatni.
4.20: Simon mmabarima neAmnon, Rina, Ben-Hanan ne Tilon.Na Yisi asefo no neSohet ne Ben-Sohet.
4.21: Yuda Babarima Sela AsefoNa Sela yɛ Yuda mma no mu baako.Na Sela asefo no ne Er a ɔwoo Leka, Lada a ɔwoo Maresa a na wɔyɛ nweratam ho adwuma wɔ Bet-Asbea,
4.22: Yokim, Kosebafo, Yoas, ne Saraf a na wodi Moab ne Yasubi-Lehem so no. Saa din yi nyinaa, wonya fii tete nkyerɛw a na wɔakyerɛw agu hɔ mu.
4.23: Na wɔyɛ nkukunwemfo a na wɔte Netaim ne Gedera. Na wɔn nyinaa yɛ nnwuma ma ɔhene.
4.24: Simeon AsefoNa Simeon mmabarima no din deNemuel, Yamin, Yarib, Serah ne Saulo.
4.25: Na Saulo asefo yɛ Salum, Mibsam ne Misma.
4.26: Na Misma asefo yɛHamuel, Sakur ne Simei.
4.27: Simei woo mmabarima dunsia ne mmabea baasia. Ne nuabarimanom de, na wɔn mu biara nni abusua kɛse saa. Ɛno nti, Simeon abusua annɔ te sɛ Yuda abusua no.
4.31: Bet-Markabot, Hasar-Susim, Bet-Biri ne Saaraim. Na saa nkurow yi nyinaa hyɛɛ wɔn ase kosii ɔhene Dawid bere so.
4.32: Wɔn asefo nso tenaa Etam, Ain, Rimon, Token ne Asan a ɛyɛ nkurow anum yi so,
4.33: ne ne nkuraa a atwa ho ahyia no kosii Baal.Na wɔn atenae ni, na wɔahyehyɛ saa din yi nyinaa wɔ wɔn anato nkrataa mu.
4.34: Wɔn a wɔka Simeon asefo ho no bi nso ne Mesobab, Yamlekne Amasia babarima Yosa,
4.35: Yoel,Yosibia babarima Yehu a ɔyɛ Seraia babarima, na ɔno nso yɛ Asiel babarima,
4.36: Elioenai, Yaakoba, Yesohaia, Asaia, Adiel, Yesimiel ne Benaia,
4.37: Sifi babarima Sisa a nʼagya yɛ Alon babarima, na ɔno yɛ Yedaia babarima, na ɔno nso yɛ Simri babarima a nʼagya yɛ Semaia.
4.38: Din a yɛabobɔ yi yɛ ntuanofo a wɔdeda Simeon mmusuakuw a wɔyɛ adefo no ano no bi.
4.39: Wɔkɔɔ Gedor fam a na ɛwɔ obon no apuei fam sɛ wɔrekɔpɛ asase pa ama wɔn mmoa adidi so.
4.40: Wonyaa mmoa adidibea pa wɔ hɔ. Na asase no so dwo na basabasayɛ biara nni hɔ. Na Ham asefo no bi akɔtena Gedor fa mu hɔ dedaw.
4.41: Yudahene Hesekia bere so no, Simeon ntuanofo no ko dii hɔ so, sɛee Ham ne Meunifo afi pasaa. Wokum obiara a na ɔte hɔ, faa asase no, efisɛ, na wɔpɛ sɛ wonya mmoa didibea pa no.
4.42: Akofo no mu ahannum a wofi Simeon abusuakuw mu no kɔɔ bepɔw Seir so, a na Pelatia, Nearia, Refaia ne Usiel a wɔn nyinaa yɛ Yisi mmabarima no na na wodi wɔn anim.
4.43: Amalekfo kakra a wɔkae no, wokunkum wɔn nyinaa, faa hɔ, na wɔtenaa hɔ.

5.1: Ruben AsefoNa Israel babarima panyin ne Ruben. Nanso esiane sɛ wammu nʼagya, na ɔne nʼagya mpenanom no mu baako kɔdae no nti, ɔde nʼabakanyɛ maa ne nua Yosef mmabarima. Esiane saa asɛm yi nti, wɔamfa Ruben din anka anato no ho sɛ abakan.
5.2: Yuda asefo na wɔyɛɛ abusuakuw a wɔwɔ tumi pa ara; ne saa nti woyii ɔman no sodifo fii wɔn mu, nanso mpanyinni no de, na ɛyɛ Yosef dea.
5.3: Israel abakan Ruben no mmabarima ne:Hanok, Palu, Hesron ne Karmi.
5.6: ne Beera. Bere a Asiriahene Tilgat-Pilneser de Rubenfo kɔɔ nnommumfa mu no, Beera na na odi Rubenfo no anim.
5.7: Wɔakyerɛw Beera nkurɔfo din sɛnea wɔn mmusua ne abusua no te: Yeiel ne wɔn ntuanoni, na Sakaria
5.8: ne Asas babarima Bela a ɔyɛ Sema babarima a ɔyɛ Yoel babarima.Saa Rubenfo yi tenaa beae a efi Aroer de kosi Nebo ne Baal-Meon.
5.9: Esiane sɛ na wɔwɔ anantwi bebree wɔ Gilead asase so no nti, wodidi kɔɔ apuei fam wɔ nweatam a ɛtrɛw kɔ Asubɔnten Eufrate no ho.
5.10: Ɔhene Saulo bere so, Rubenfo dii Hagarfo so nkonim wɔ ɔko mu. Enti wotu kɔɔ Hagarfo atenae a ɛwɔ Gilead apuei fam hɔ no.
5.11: Gad AsefoBasan asase so no, na Gad asefo na wɔtete asase a edi Rubenfo de no so. Wɔtrɛw kɔɔ apuei fam kosii Saleka.
5.12: Na Yoel na otua wɔn ano wɔ Basan asase so. Na Safam, Yanai ne Safat yɛ nʼaboafo.
5.13: Na wɔn abusuafo a wɔyɛ ntuanofo ma mmusua afoforo ason din ne:Mikael, Mesulam, Seba, Yorai, Yakan, Sia ne Eber.
5.14: Eyinom nyinaa yɛ Huri babarima Abihail a ɔyɛ Yaroa babarima, Gilead babarima, Mikael babarima, Yesisai babarima Yahdo babarima, Bus babarima.
5.15: Abdiel babarima Ahi, Guni babarima no na na ɔyɛ wɔn mmusua no ntuano.
5.16: Gadfo no tenaa Gilead asase a ɛwɔ Basan ne ne nkuraa ne Saron tataw no nyinaa so.
5.17: Yudahene Yotam ne Israelhene Yeroboam bere so na wɔkyerɛw eyinom nyinaa guu abusuadua nkrataa mu.
5.18: Yordan Apuei Fam MmusuakuwNa akofo akɛse a wɔwɔ Ruben, Gad mmusua ne Manase abusua fa mu no ano si mpem aduanan anan ahanson ne aduosia. Wokurakura nkatabo, mfoa ne agyan, na wɔn nyinaa akwadaw wɔ akodi mu.
5.19: Wɔko tiaa Hagarfo, Yeturfo, Nafisfo ne Nodabfo.
5.20: Wosu frɛɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ ɔko no mu, na otiee wɔn mpaebɔ, efisɛ wɔde wɔn ho too ne so. Enti wodii Hagarfo no ne wɔn dɔm nyinaa so nkonim.
5.21: Asade a wɔfa fii Hagarfo no nkyɛn no yɛ yoma mpem aduonum, nguan mpem ahannu aduonum, mfurum mpenu ne nneduafo mpem ɔha.
5.22: Wokunkum Hagarfo no bebree wɔ ɔko no mu, efisɛ na Onyankopɔn reko tia wɔn. Enti wɔtenaa wɔn asase so kosii sɛ wotwaa wɔn asu.
5.23: Manase abusua fa no trɛw wɔ asase no so fi Basan kosii Baal-Hermon, Senir ne bepɔw Hermon ho. Na wɔdɔɔso yiye.
5.24: Eyinom ne wɔn mmusua no ntuanofo: Efer, Yisi, Eliel, Asriel, Yeremia, Hodawia ne Yahdiel. Na wɔn mu biara agye din sɛ ɔkofo kɛse ne ɔkannifo.
5.25: Nanso na wonni nokware, na wobuu wɔn agyanom ne Onyankopɔn apam no so. Wɔsom aman a Onyankopɔn sɛee wɔn no anyame.
5.26: Enti Israel Nyankopɔn de hyɛɛ Asiriahene Pul (a na wɔsan frɛ no Tilgat-Pilneser) koma mu sɛ ɔnko mfa asase no, na ɔnkyekyere Rubenfo, Gadfo ne Manasefo abusua fa sɛ nneduafo. Asiriafo no twaa wɔn asu kɔɔ Halah, Habor, Hara ne Asubɔnten Gosan ho a wɔda so te hɔ besi nnɛ.

6.1: Asɔfo Awo NtoatoasoNa Lewi mmabarima yɛ:Gerson, Kohat ne Merari.
6.2: Na Kohat asefo nso yɛ:Amram, Ishar, Hebron ne Usiel.
6.3: Na Amram mma yɛ:Aaron, Mose ne Miriam.Na Aaron mmabarima yɛ:Nadab, Abihu, Eleasar ne Itamar.
6.5: Abisua woo Buki,na Buki woo Usi.
6.6: Usi woo Serahia. Serahia woo Meraiot.
6.7: Meraiot woo Amaria,na Amaria woo Ahitub.
6.8: Ahitub woo Sadok,na Sadok woo Ahimaas.
6.10: Yohanan woo Asaria aɔno na na ɔyɛ ɔsɔfopanyin wɔ asɔredan a Salomo sii wɔ Yerusalem no mu.
6.15: Wotwaa Yehosadak asu bere a Awurade de Yudafo ne Yerusalemfo kɔɔ nnommum mu a na wɔhyɛ Nebukadnessar ase no.
6.16: Lewifo MmusuaNa Lewi mmabarima din deGersom, Kohat ne Merari.
6.17: Na Libni ne Simei ka Gersom asefo ho.
6.18: Na Amram, Ishar, Hebron ne Usielka Kohat asefo no ho.
6.19: Na Mahli ne Musika Merari asefo no ho.Eyinom ne Lewifo mmusua sɛnea wɔn mpanyimfo nnidiso te.
6.28: Na Samuel mmabarima din ne:Yoel a ɔyɛ ɔpanyinne Abiya a ɔto so abien no.
6.29: Na Merari mma ne:Mahli, Libni,Simei, Usa,
6.31: Asɔredan Mu Nnwom Ho NimdefoDawid maa saa nnipa a wɔn din didi so yi dii Awurade fi nnwom anim, bere a wɔde Apam Adaka no sii hɔ no.
6.32: Wɔde nnwom kaa wɔn som ho wɔ Ahyiae Ntamadan no mu hɔ kosii sɛ Salomo sii Awurade asɔredan no wɔ Yerusalem. Afei, wɔnam mmara a wɔde maa wɔn so dii wɔn dwuma wɔ hɔ.
6.33: Saa mmarima yi na wɔne wɔn mma som wɔ hɔ no.Heman, dwom ho nimdefo no, na ofi Kohat abusua mu.Wɔto nʼabusua ana fiYoel, Samuel,
6.39: Herman abediakyiri a odi kan no din de Asaf, a na ofi Gerson abusua mu.Wɔto Asaf abusua ana fi Berekia, Simea,
6.44: Herman abediakyiri a ɔto so abien no din de Etan, a na ofi Merari abusua mu.Wɔto Etan abusua ana fi Kisi, Abdi,Maluk,
6.48: Aaron AsefoWɔmaa wɔn abusuafo a wɔyɛ Lewifo no nso dwuma ahorow bi dii wɔ Ahyiae Ntamadan a ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn fi no mu.
6.49: Aaron ne nʼasefo nko na wɔsom sɛ asɔfo. Na wɔde afɔrebɔde gu ɔhyew afɔremuka ne ohuam afɔremuka so, na wodi dwuma biara a ɛfa kronkron mu kronkron hɔ ho. Wɔnam mmara a Onyankopɔn somfo Mose de maa wɔn no so, yɛɛ mpata maa Israel.
6.50: Na Aaron asefo yɛ:Eleasar, Pinehas, Abisua,
6.54: Eyi ne abakɔsɛm a ɛfa nkurow ne asase a wɔnam ntontobɔ kronkron so de maa Aaron ne nʼasefo a wofi Kohat abusua mu no.
6.55: Na Hebron ne mmoa adidibea nsase a atwa ho ahyia wɔ Yuda no ka ho.
6.56: Nanso mfuw ne nkuraa a atwa ho ahyia no de, wɔde maa Yefune babarima Kaleb.
6.57: Enti saa nkurow yi a mmoa adidibea atwa biara ho ahyia na wɔde maa Aaron asefo: Hebron, a ɛyɛ guankɔbea kurow, Libna, Yatir, Estemoa,
6.60: Na wɔmaa wɔn Gibeon, Geba, Alemet ne Anatot fii Benyamin asase mu a mmoa adidibea ka emu biara ho.Enti nkurow dumiɛnsa na wɔde maa Aaron asefo.
6.61: Na Kohat asefo a wɔkae no nso, wonyaa nkurow du a wɔnam ntontobɔ kronkron so fii Manase abusua fa no asase so.
6.62: Gerson asefo nam ntontobɔ kronkron so nyaa nkurow dumiɛnsa fii Isakar, Aser ne Naftali nsase so. Wonyaa bi nso fii Basan pɔw mu a ɛyɛ Manase de, a ɛwɔ Yordan apuei fam no.
6.63: Merari asefo nam ntontobɔ kronkron so, nyaa nkurow dumien fii Ruben, Gad ne Sebulon nsase so.
6.64: Enti Israelfo de saa nkurow yi ne mmoa adidibea yi nyinaa maa Lewifo.
6.65: Wɔnam ntontobɔ kronkron so na wɔde nkurow a ɛwowɔ Yuda, Simeon ne Benyamin nsase so mae sɛnea wɔaka dedaw no.
6.66: Saa nkurow yi ne ɛho mmoa adidibea na Kohat asefo nya fii Efraim asase so:
6.67: Sekem (guankɔbea kurow) a ɛwɔ Efraim bepɔw asase no so, Geser,
6.70: Kohat asefo nkae no, wɔde saa nkurow a efi Manase abusua fa no mu na ɛmaa wɔn: Aner ne Bileam a emu biara mmoa adidibea ka ho.
6.71: Gerson asefo nyaa kurow a wɔfrɛ no Golan a ɛwɔ Basan no fii Manase abusua fa asase so a Astarot ka ho, a ne nyinaa mmoa adidibea da ho.
6.72: Isakar asase so nso, wɔmaa wɔn Kedes, Daberat,
6.73: Ramot ne Anem a wɔn mmoa adidibea ka ho.
6.74: Aser asase so, wonyaa Masal, Abdon,
6.75: Hukok ne Rehob a na emu biara mmoa adidibea ka ho.
6.76: Naftali asase so, wɔde Kedes a ɛwɔ Galilea, Hamon ne Kiriataim maa wɔn, a na mmoa adidibea ka emu biara ho.
6.77: Merari asefo nkae no nyaa Yokneam, Karta, Rimon ne Tabor nkurow, fi Sebulon asase so, a na mmoa adidibea ka biara ho.
6.78: Ruben asase a ɛda Asubɔnten Yordan apuei fam a ɛne Yeriko di nhwɛanim no nso, wonyaa Beser a ɛyɛ nweatam kurow, Yahas,
6.79: Kedemot ne Mefaat a mmoa adidibea ka emu biara ho.
6.80: Na Gad asase so nso, wonyaa Ramot a ɛwɔ Gilead, Mahanaim,
6.81: Hesbon ne Yaser a mmoa adidibea ka biara ho.

7.1: Isakar AsefoNa Isakar mmabarima baanan no din deTola, Pua, Yasub ne Simron.
7.2: Tola mmabarima no ne:Usi, Refaia, Yeriel, Yahmai, Yibsam ne Samuel. Na wɔn mu biara yɛ wɔn agyanom mmusua ntuanofo. Ɔhene Dawid bere so no, na mmarima dodow a wɔwɔ saa mmusua yi mu a wɔyɛ asraafo no dodow yɛ mpem aduonu abien ne ahansia (,).
7.3: Na Usi babarima din de:Yisrahia.Na Yisrahia mmabarima din de:Mikael, Obadia, Yoel ne Yisia a na wɔn baanum tuatua mmusua ano.
7.4: Mmarima dodow a na wɔwɔ hɔ a wɔyɛ asraafo no dodow yɛ mpem aduasa asia. Na wɔn baanum no nyinaa yerenom ne wɔn mmabarima yɛ bebree.
7.5: Mmarima a na wɔwɔ hɔ a wofi Isakar mmusua no nyinaa mu a wɔyɛ asraafo no dodow yɛ mpem aduɔwɔtwe ason (,). Wɔkyerɛw wɔn nyinaa din nnidiso nnidiso guu wɔn anato krataa mu.
7.6: Benyamin AsefoNa Benyamin mmabarima baasa no din de:Bela. Beker ne Yediael.
7.7: Na Bela mmabarima yɛ:Esbon, Usi, Usiel, Yerimot ne Iri. Na saa akofo baanum yi yɛ mmusua ntuanofo. Nnipa a wofi wɔn asefo mu yɛɛ asraafo no dodow yɛ mpem aduonu abien ne aduasa anan (,). Wɔkyerɛw wɔn nyinaa din guu wɔn anato krataa mu.
7.8: Na Beker mmabarima din de:Semira, Yoas, Elieser, Elioenai, Omri, Yeremot, Abia, Anatot ne Alemet.
7.9: Sɛnea na wɔn anato kyerɛ no, na wɔn abusua ntuanofo akyi no, wɔn asefo mpem aduonu ne ahannu (,) wɔ hɔ a wotumi yɛ asraafo.
7.10: Na Yediael babarima ne:Bilhan.Na Bilhan mmabarima ne:Yeus, Benyamin, Ehud, Kenaana, Setan, Tarsis ne Ahisahar.
7.11: Na wɔyɛ Yediael mmusua no mu ntuanofo a wɔn asefo a na wɔka wɔn ho a wotumi yɛ asraafo no dodow yɛ mpem dunson ne ahannu (,).
7.12: Na Ir mmabarima ne Supim, ne Hupim. Aher na ɔwoo Husim.
7.13: Naftali AsefoNa Naftali mmabarima yɛ:Yahsiel, Guni, Yeser ne Silum. Na wɔn nyinaa yɛ Yakob yere Bilha asefo.
7.14: Manase AsefoManase mmabarima a ɔne ne mpena Aramni wowoo wɔn ne Asriel ne Makir. Makir na ɔwoo Gilead.
7.15: Makir pɛɛ ɔyerenom maa Hupim ne Supim. Na wɔfrɛ Makir nuabea se Maaka. Na Makir asefo no mu baako a wɔfrɛ no Selofehad wowoo mmabea nko ara.
7.16: Makir yere Maaka woo ɔbabarima a ɔtoo no din Peres. Na ne nuabarima din de Seres. Peres mmabarima din de Ulam ne Rekem.
7.17: Na Ulam babarima din de:Bedan.Na wɔn nyinaa yɛ Gileadfo a wɔyɛ Manase babarima Makir asefo.
7.18: Makir nuabea Moleket woo Is-Hod, Abieser ne Mahla.
7.19: Na Semida mmabarima yɛ:Ahian, Sekem, Likhi ne Aniam.
7.20: Efraim AsefoEfraim asefo ne:Sutela, Bered, Tahat, Elada,Tahat,
7.21: Sabad ne Sutela.Wokunkum Efraim mmabarima Eser ne Elad wɔ Gat, efisɛ wɔpɛe sɛ wowia nyɛmmoa fi akuafo a wɔbɛn hɔ no.
7.22: Wɔn agya Efraim suu wɔn kyɛe yiye, na nʼabusuafo bɛkyekyee ne werɛ.
7.23: Ɛno akyi no, Efraim kɔɔ ne yere ho, na onyinsɛn woo ɔbabarima. Efraim too no din Beria esiane abɛbrɛsɛ a nʼabusuafo faa mu no nti.
7.24: Efraim woo ɔbabea too no din Seer. Ɔno na ɔkyekyeree nkurow Bet-Horon Anafo, Atifi ne Usen-Seera.
7.25: Efraim asefo nnidiso ne Refa, Resef, Tela, Tahan,
7.28: Efraim asefo no tenaa asase Bet-El ne ne nkurow a atwa afa anafo fam, Naaran a ɛda apuei fam, Geser ne ne nkuraa a ɛda atɔe fam ne Sekem ne ne nkuraa a atwa ho ahyia, kɔfa atifi fam, de kosi Aya a nkuraa ka ho no so.
7.29: Manase hye so no, na nkurow a ɛdeda hɔ yɛ Bet-Sean, Taanak, Megido, Dor ne wɔn nkuraa a atwa ho ahyia no. Israel ba Yosef asefo tenaa saa nkurow yi so.
7.30: Aser AsefoNa Aser mmabarima yɛ:Yimna, Yiswa, Yiswi ne Beria. Na wɔwɔ onuabea a ne din de Sera.
7.31: Na Beria mmabarima din de:Heber ne Malkiel a ɔwoo Birsait no.
7.32: Na Heber mmabarima din de Yaflet, Somer ne Hotam. Na wɔwɔ onuabea a ne din de Sua.
